Author: dragaynite
Text: I think being tired makes you hungry so it’s possible to gain weight if you’re awake for too long. And also you can really function as well if you’re going off of shitty sleep but idk I’ve gone through periods of severe sleep deprivation bc I was working full time and a student full time and still balanced in a social life so I was lucky to get three hours of sleep a night and it didn’t really effect my weight too much, I lost a little but not drastic
